TABLE.NAME: filter_mediawiki
TABLE.COMMENT: Table with the wikis from that you can include pages

FIELD.NAME: lang
FIELD.COMMENT: Comma-seperated lists of possible languages of a wiki family. Can be disabled (value = NULL) when the entry is no wiki family.

FIELD.NAME: api
FIELD.COMMENT: URL to the Wiki api. Use $lang when more than one language is described

FIELD.NAME: page_url
FIELD.COMMENT: URL with the wiki pages. Use $1 to show the place of the page name and $lang for the language. Example: https://$lang.wikiversity.org/wiki/$1
